advice: The BBB (Better Business Bureau) suggests that you change your passwords every month

Remember: life is a breath; Soon I will vanish from your sight. The eye that looks will not see me; You may search but I will be gone. Like a cloud fading in the sky  Man dissolves into death. And never comes home again.
My advice to you is to get married: If you find a good wife youll be happy; If not  youll become a philosopher

No mans knowledge here can go beyond his experience

Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company.

The pre requisite to self-discovery  self-creation and self-heal  to change one’s line of thought  to get rid of old compulsive habits  and to move along the spiritual path one has to lay the foundation by knowing and realizing the most fundamental aspect is that I am different from my mind and from my body. When this is realized then one can easily witness what goes inside the body and how mind has been taking you on a ride. You are the master of the chariot  chariot is the body  mind is the driver and you are sitting behind the driver instructioning him where to move. Which means you are the master, your mind is the driver and the vehicle is your body. This distinction and feeling is necessary without which you cannot approach towards knowing about yourself.
Knowing yourself is the first step towards wisdom
You don t realize the true value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
The truth is..everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for
Fail to succeed  Taste the struggle

Everything in this world  along with this world  is temporary. So stop worrying about the results of events. Stop all the manipulation to affect the outcomes and just play the game for the joy of playing the game.
Don t react or talk  just be patient and calm when in worst situation  skip it for a while and think about it later  it gives you clear picture of what happened and what can be done to get over it.
Fail till you find how weak you re and work hard to overcome it.
